sentences.sContent: Forensics includes many fields of science, including anthropology, biology, chemistry, engineering, genetics, medicine, pathology, phonetics, psychiatry, and toxicology.
sentences.sCn: 法医物证学涉及到多个科学领域，包括人类学、工程学、医药学、病理学、语音学、精神病学和毒理学。

sentences.sContent: Taking such refresher courses in Linguistics as phonetics, phonology, morphology, and etymology in Dept. of Japanese at Shanghai University of Foreign Languages (9/1992-7/1993).
sentences.sCn: 在上海外国语大学日语系进修语音学，音位学，形态学和词源学等语言学课程（1992年9月至1993年7月）。

sentences.sContent: Useful Courses for English-teaching include: Psychology, teaching methodology,phonetics, rhetoric, grammar, composition.
sentences.sCn: 对英语教学有用的课程包括：心理学、教学方法论、语音学、修辞学、语法、写作。
